channel.title: What games machine?
channel.description:
Hey everyone
Recently i managed to get enough money for a games machine. What Machine should i get ?
Xbox 360 or Playstation 3 ?
Any other ideas ?

item.title: What games machine?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

As said before, get what your friends have, but if I had the choice to give my friends consoles, it would be Xbox mainly because almost the whole world has an Xbox.
Also Xbox can be pirated

Read full topic

item.title: What games machine?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:35, topic:371412”]She asked what console to get, please don’t turn this into a debate on which console is better.

I would go for the PS3, as you don’t have to dish out $60 (I think) for the online and also because my friends mostly have PS3’s.[/quote]

You get what you pay for.

Read full topic

item.title: What games machine?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:35, topic:371412”]She asked what console to get, please don’t turn this into a debate on which console is better.

I would go for the PS3, as you don’t have to dish out $60 (I think) for the online and also because my friends mostly have PS3’s.[/quote]

$60 a year isn’t that bad though. It comes out to $5 a month, which is cheaper than a RuneScape membership.

Like most people have said, go with whatever most of your friends have.

Read full topic

item.title: What games machine?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

She asked what console to get, please don’t turn this into a debate on which console is better.

I would go for the PS3, as you don’t have to dish out $60 (I think) for the online and also because my friends mostly have PS3’s.

item.title: What games machine?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:33, topic:371412”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=467501.msg3419664#msg3419664 date=1291418915]

Xbox because of grand theft auto and black ops

But both of those games are available on the PS3 as well, so thats not much of a reason is it?

I own a PS3 and a Wii, I wouldn’t buy the Xbox ever.

I have a PS3 and an XBox360; both gifts.
I would recommend the XBox360 for reliability, but if you want it cheaper, then get the PS3; as right now the live is free.
Over all the PS3 would be a cheaper option because of the free live.
XBox360 is more reliable then the PS3 though; so you choose.
[/quote]

The xbox is not reliable at all…[/quote]
I guess I’m lucky?
I’ve had the same XBox for 3 years and had no problems.
PS3 we have had for 1 year and had it fixed twice already.

Read full topic

I would get the xbox 360, it seems like it has better graphics, but you have to pay for online, whereas the PS3 has free online.

item.title: What games machine?
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:21, topic:371412”][quote author=RuneSpace link=topic=467501.msg3418877#msg3418877 date=1291339245]

I’ve grown on the Wii. Its a great family console

Apparently you haven’t heard of kinect.

When they start selling it separately I’ll look into it. I’m perfectly fine with PS3s Move or whatever its called.

nobody has even suggested the good old Ps1
[/quote]
Most likely because it’s not in the poll and that it was the worst game console ever released.
There was only like 3 classic games on it.

But the one that you should get if looking for classic games, as I stated above, is the Nintendo 64.[/quote]
agreed

Read full topic

item.title: What games machine?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:

Apparently you haven’t heard of kinect.

When they start selling it separately I’ll look into it. I’m perfectly fine with PS3s Move or whatever its called.
[/quote]

nobody has even suggested the good old Ps1 :([/quote]
Most likely because it’s not in the poll and that it was the worst game console ever released.
There was only like 3 classic games on it.

But the one that you should get if looking for classic games, as I stated above, is the Nintendo 64.

item.description:

[/quote]
http://www.google.co.nz/images?q=Image+Oscillite+Monitor&um=1&ie=UTF-8&source=og&sa=N&hl=en&tab=wi&biw=1600&bih=775 da fawk[/quote]
